mapper.select: /* 특정 과목합격기준점수 조회 */ SELECT sp.ls_p_score_code ,sp.li_code ,ls.li_name ,ls.ls_subject ,sp.ls_code ,sp.ls_name ,sp.ls_total_question_num ,sp.ls_p_standard_score ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_id ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_datetime FROM subject_pass_score AS sp INNER JOIN license_subject AS ls on sp.ls_code = ls.ls_code WHERE sp.ls_p_score_code = #{lsPScoreCode};

/* 자격증별 과목합격기준점수목록 조회 */ SELECT sp.ls_p_score_code ,sp.li_code ,sp.ls_code ,sp.ls_name ,sp.ls_total_question_num ,sp.ls_p_standard_score ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_id ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_datetime FROM subject_pass_score AS sp WHERE sp.li_code = #{liCode};
